definition: weight/number/code/to pile/to stack/classifier for length or distance (yard), happenings etc

sentences.english: It exposes a limited surface area of full-trust code.
sentences.chinese: 它會公開完全信任程式碼的有限介面區。

sentences.english: Lines of Code – Indicates the approximate number of lines in the code.
sentences.chinese: 指出程式碼中行數的約略值。

sentences.english: In the code editor, create an event-handling method with the appropriate signature.
sentences.chinese: 在程式碼編輯器中，以適當的簽章建立事件處理方法。
讀程式碼，理解它並查證它。

sentences.english: Many times I found bugs when trying to explain what my code is doing to a reviewer.
sentences.chinese: 我好幾次都是在跟檢視者解釋程式碼時發現錯誤。

sentences.english: How do I request a Multi-purpose code signing certificates?
sentences.chinese: 我如何申請多用途程式碼簽章憑證？

sentences.english: This code can be included in the type declaration.
sentences.chinese: 型別宣告可包含本程式碼。

sentences.english: Correctness and security verifications happen in safe-critical code.
sentences.chinese: 正確性和安全性驗證會在安全關鍵程式碼中進行。

sentences.english: A security-critical method is accessed from transparent code.
sentences.chinese: 安全性關鍵方法可透過透明的程式碼存取。

sentences.english: Place a lock on that object and enclose your code inside that lock.
sentences.chinese: 將鎖定置於物件上並將您的程式碼封入鎖定內。

sentences.english: Changes to code in read-only files.
sentences.chinese: 唯讀檔中的程式碼變更。

sentences.english: When he/she asks you questions you'll understand your code better.
sentences.chinese: 當此人問問題時，你將更能瞭解你的程式碼。

sentences.english: These reminder arrows are not added to your code, and do not print.
sentences.chinese: 這些提醒箭號不會加入程式碼內，也不會印出。

sentences.english: You can specify on a project-by-project basis whether or not event code is disabled.
sentences.chinese: 可以針對專案逐一指定是否停用事件程式碼。

sentences.english: Provides step by step information for adding validation code to a dataset.
sentences.chinese: 提供加入驗證程式碼至資料集的逐步資訊。

pinyin: zi4 ran2 yu3 yan2 chu3 li3

definition: to transfer (for a specific purpose)/to allocate/(computing) to invoke (a command, an application etc)
seize every minute and second (idiom); not a minute to lose/every moment counts
